title: Perspective Detective: The Case of the Missing Book
description: Experience the sequel to the acclaimed 3x gold medal-winning book Perspective Detective by multi-award-winning author Cazzy Zahursky! In "Perspective The Case of the Missing Book," Zahursky crafts a clever mystery layered with rhymes, lessons in empathy, and optical illusions. Through an interactive narrative, readers can explore the idea that every situation can be seen from multiple angles.This engaging and thought-provoking tale, filled with visual puzzles, delves into themes of empathy, communication, and understanding different perspectives. Designed for readers of all ages, it's a story that's sure to captivate both children and adults alike.
author: Cazzy Zahursky
